Manages format flags.

@1@ returns current formatting setting
@2@ replaces current settings with given ones.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|flags|new formatting setting. It can be a combination of [[#Formatting flags|formatting flags]] constants.
}}
{{par end}}
